activities:
As a third party fulfillment vendor, we receive user names, addresses, and sometimes phone numbers. We typically do not require email addresses, but this may be included as needed. The information received is used for the sole purpose of order fulfillment. The data mentioned above is stored on our mainframe that is only accessible from outside our internal network via our VPN connection with secure and authorized access.

When conducting commerce directly with consumers via a Glamorise-owned website, we collect only the information voluntarily submitted to us. This may include name, address, phone number, email address and various other information as appropriate.

In the normal course of business related to Glamorise-owned and operated websites, or in our third party fulfillment relationships, we will use information only for the common sense purpose for which it has been provided.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer data is processed electronically. This data is not manually processed at any time
